name: Southwestern Dip (Paula Deen)
ingredients: 1/3 cups dried minced onion and chili
1 cups sour cream and 1 cups mayo, OR 2 cups sour cream
instructions: In bowl combine the dip mix and store what you donâ€™t use in a jar.
In bowl combine dip mix with sour cream.
Refrigerate at least 2 hours for flavors to blend.
Serve with chips or fresh veggies.
